snippet: The N.B.A. veteran Jason Collins marched in Boston’s gay pride parade with Representative Joe Kennedy III of Massachusetts, his onetime roommate at Stanford.
abstract: NBA veteran Jason Collins marches in Boston’s gay pride parade with Rep Joe Kennedy III of Massachusetts, his onetime roommate at Stanford.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. veteran Jason Collins marched in Boston’s gay pride parade with Representative Joe Kennedy III of Massachusetts, his onetime roommate at Stanford.
